p6: The Bounty Hunter Programme is designed for individuals (‘Hunters’) to submit information and tips regarding websites suspected of hosting counterfeit casino and slots games. Hunters may report websites they have personally investigated or those from which they have received credible information.
li20: Submissions must be accompanied by sufficient evidence to support the claim of counterfeit games. Gamecheck, the entity responsible for validating such claims, will conduct an investigation to ascertain the authenticity of the reported games.
li21: Gamecheck reserves the right to verify the authenticity of reported games with respective gaming vendors. Upon confirmation of the games being counterfeit, the Bounty Hunter who first provided the information will be eligible to receive a reward per website. We negotiate with the Bounty Hunter on each deal based on the information they provide.
li22: All rewards will be disbursed exclusively through cryptocurrency to an TRC20 wallet address provided by the Bounty Hunter.
li23: The Bounty Hunter Programme reserves the right to modify or terminate the reward structure at any time without prior notice.
li24: By participating in the Bounty Hunter Programme, Hunters agree to adhere to these terms and conditions, as well as any additional guidelines set forth by Gamecheck.
